definitions.definition: In a historic manner ; with reference to history or the historical record .
examples: Historically speaking, this company has always collected payment before starting work.
Virtually all modern scholars of antiquity agree that Jesus existed historically .

definitions.definition: According to history : formerly , in the past , traditionally .
examples: Historically , this company collected payment before starting work.

definitions.definition: To an unprecedented or extremely rare degree .

main_definition: In a historic manner ; with reference to history or the historical record .
secondary_definitions: According to history : formerly , in the past , traditionally .
To an unprecedented or extremely rare degree .
